text.__SUMMARY__: Galium azuayicum is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Jaramillo, T.; Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Galium azuayicum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46017A11029350. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46017A11029350.en. Retrieved 21 December 2017.
